'''''Oh, the Humanity!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the second part of "[[Fate of a Fighter]]."

== Trivia ==
* The phrase used in the English translation of the achievement originates from the live broadcast of the Hindenburg disaster in 1937, when a reporter exclaimed, "Oh, the humanity!" while witnessing the airship's crash.<ref>https://www.archives.gov/exhibits/eyewitness/html.php?section=5</ref>
